resources.string: \‚ÄúYou have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.\‚Äù\n‚Äì Albert Einstein
contact question (do not change this please)
purchase question (do not change this please)

Are you tired of missing out on batches and having them instantly disappear from the screen? Would you like to drive more safely while on the road? Swipe to learn about how Caret can help you flourish with Instacart!
aret is a unique batch grabber for Instacart. We know what you\'re thinking‚Ä¶ that is a‚Ä¶
Blind assumption of those who don\'t merely know the rules of the game. ü§°
Yes! By using automation, Caret will persistently scour for batches that align to a shopper\'s preferences faster than humanly possible.
Indeed, Caret does offer an amazing amount criteria to customize and filter batches. As well as features like bring Instacart to the screen, alerts, a batch log, and so much more.
‚Ä¢ Something that will get you deactivated. ü§¶
\"They want to see you do good. But never better than them.\"

Every single APK of Caret is customized at a low-level; making it indistinguishable. \"IAMs\" are what Android apps use to discover signatures of other apps. Where Caret does not have any constant signatures.
Caret does not make any network requests with Instacart and it\'s actions are randomized.
Your business is not our business!
Caret is not freeware, one with ads, micro-transactions, or other gimmicks. A one-time purchase of the full release is for the lifetime of the device.
Caret respects the data & privacy of it\'s customers. Caret does require users to authenticate which uses the internet. After that, no network calls are made. Caret doesn\'t even report app crashes.
Test it yourself: App Info > Mobile & Wifi Usage.
Swipe the images to scroll & the green area to continue.
Caret works on all Android phones versions 8 (Oreo) through Android 13.

After you have received Caret in your email, download the APK file to your phone. You will then need to enable the installation of 3rd party apps. There are two methods, either for an app or globally. You only need to do one of the lists below. Choose whichever best suites your phone etc.
‚Ä¢ On your device, tap Settings > Apps
‚Ä¢ At the top-right, tap the 3 dotted icon (Vertical ellipsis) Vertical ellipsis.
‚Ä¢ Tap Special access > Install unknown apps
‚Ä¢ Tap the browser from where you will download the APK, such as Chrome
‚Ä¢ If prompted, toggle Allow from this source on
‚Ä¢ On your device, go to Settings.
‚Ä¢ Tap the browser from where you will download the APK, such as Firefox
‚Ä¢ If prompted, toggle Allow from this source on
‚Ä¢ Search bar and type in ‚ÄúUnknown‚Äù without the quotes.
‚Ä¢ Find the app you wish to permit, such as a file manager and select allow.
‚Ä¢ Using the enabled app, tap the APK file you download and select install.

You would enable access - for whichever app - to install 3rd party apps. That app can be a browser or file manager. Then using that app to install the APK file you\'ve downloaded. You can revert that access after installing Caret.
There are three ways of purchasing Caret:
A week trial of the full app - at half price - to test the waters. The trial has a cost because, how Caret works, requires manual work from us to offer it.
If you paid for a trial. You can upgrade to full for an additional $10
You will have access to Caret for the device you are using right now.

Refunds are given at the discretion of Caret. We will gladly give refunds for failing to provide a product that is not as advertised. We will not grant refunds for changes of heart. Proof of claims is required.
For trial purchases, please contact us within of two days from your purchase date. For full or upgrade purchases, seven days.
Please include your email in the comments of your purchase. Otherwise, you\'ll be refunded. No worries! You may try again.
The comment section has a max length of about 50 characters. Too short for an email and key. After your purchase, you\'ll be asked for the key via email. Click copy to make that easier. üëç
Tap either option or do so manually
The key to be replied via email
Are you ready to become a more productive shopper?
Feel free to scroll back. Please uninstall this app when you are finished! It is not required and is detectable by other apps.\n\nIf you have any questions, please reach out to us via email.
